thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 18 of 40
thread.title: P. Roderick

author: P. Roderick
title: P. Roderick
text: From the first few minutes of my phone call I was impressed with this company. The gentleman I spoke to was patient, helpful and knowledgeable. I am a complete novice to the expresso experience, making the purchase as a gift. The person who picked up my call answered all my questions, gave suggestions and, ultimately, gave me a better deal than I found elsewhere on line. I couldn't be happier. It was a refreshing experience to receive such great, personal, respectful customer service.
